mapper.select: select m_no, m_id, m_pwd, m_name, m_phone, m_email, m_birth, m_gender from member where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: insert into member(m_no, m_id, m_pwd, m_name, m_phone, m_email, m_birth, m_gender) values(member_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{m_pwd}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, #{m_birth}, #{m_gender})
mapper.select: select nvl((select 1 from member where m_id = #{m_id}), 0) as state from dual
mapper.update: update member set m_pwd = #{m_pwd}, m_phone = #{m_phone}, m_email = #{m_email}, m_pwdchanged = sysdate where m_id = #{m_id}
